===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|宀|t1=roof|周|t2=full|貝|t3=treasure|ls=ic}}.

The two lower components of {{lang|zh|周}} and {{lang|zh|貝}} had combined to form {{och-l|貫|string of cowries}}, hence the incorrect analysis in ''{{w|Shuowen Jiezi}}'' of this character as {{Han compound|宀|貫}}.
